description.english: Changed Kasuga to three different jobs other than his starting job.

description.english: Changed all four party members to jobs different from their default jobs and won a battle.
description.german: Den Standardjob aller vier Gruppenmitglieder gewechselt und einen Kampf gewonnen.
description.french: Les quatre membres du groupe ont changé de jobs et remporté un combat.

description.koreana: 배틀 참가 멤버 4명 전원이 원래 직업에서 전직한 직업으로 배틀을 해서 승리했다

description.tchinese: 參與戰鬥的４名成員皆從原本的職業換成其他職業進行戰鬥，並獲得勝利
description.portuguese: Colocou todos os quatro membros do grupo em outras ocupações além das iniciais e venceu uma batalha.
description.russian: Вы обучили всех четверых активных участников отряда новым профессиям и выиграли с ними бой.

description.koreana: 클리어 후 모드에서 라스트 던전을 공략했다

description.english: Exceed 10 billion yen in capital for Kasuga's company.
description.german: Erwirtschafte mehr als 10 Milliarden Yen für Kasugas Firma.
description.french: Capital de plus de 10 milliards de yens atteint avec la société de Kasuga.
description.italian: Hai superato i 10 miliardi di yen di capitale con l'azienda di Kasuga.
description.spanish: El capital de la empresa de Kasuga ha superado los diez billones de yenes.
description.koreana: 카스가의 회사 보유 자금이 100억 엔을 넘었다
description.japanese: 春日の会社の経営資金が１００億円を超えた
description.schinese: 春日公司的经营资金超过100亿日元
description.tchinese: 春日公司的經營資金超過１００億圓

description.russian: Вы увеличили капитализацию компании Касуги до 10 миллиардов иен.

description.english: Moved Kasuga's company into a new office.

description.russian: Вы перевели компанию Касуги в новый офис.

description.english: Raised Kasuga's company into the top company in Yokohama.
description.german: Kasugas Firma zur besten in Yokohama gemacht.
description.french: La société de Kasuga figure parmi les plus grandes sociétés de Yokohama.

description.spanish: Has convertido la empresa de Kasuga en la número uno de Yokohama.

displayName.japanese: スプリングな砲撃予備軍

description.french: Un pervers est sorti du coffre pour la première fois.

displayName.japanese: 貴方に遊んで貰えてよかった
